name: Uprising
desc:
The paranoia is in bloom, the PR The transmissions will They'll try to push Keep us all dumbed and hope that We will never see the around (So come on!) Another promise, another , another A package not to keep us trapped in greed With all the belts wrapped around our minds And endless red tape to keep the confined (So come on!) REF
They will not us They will stop degrading us They will not us We will be victorious Interchanging mind Come let the revolution its toll if you could Flick the and open your third eye, you'd see that We should never be to die (So come on!) Rise up and take the back, it's time that The fat cats had a heart , you know that Their time is coming to an end We have to unify and our flag ascend

REF

(x2)
